thread.title: Stephen Carroll
thread.title_full: Hudson Reed USA reviewed by Stephen Carroll

author: Stephen Carroll
title: Stephen Carroll
text:
i purchased a shower system for a customer, installed it and 2 years later the thermostatic valve leaked. the plastic part of it was cracked.i contacted Hudson Reed and a week later, after numerous emails and phone calls, the wrong part was shipped to me.the Hudson Reed people are pleasant, but there system seems screwed up at best. however,the company seems to care about its customers and reputation.within an hour of my complaint, i was contacted by a company official who cut through the confusion between me and the staff to totally correct the order.
with apologies, he explained that he has reviewed the problems i had and is already working to adjust his system to better serve us.
